name: Growing Flowers
description:
GROWING FLOWERS, is a frenzied game in which you must help a flower to grow.  How to play:  

1-Use the mouse to move the sun and the rain in your favor. 

 2-Press on the bees to kill them.  

Advice: 

 1-Concentrate on the rain, it is the most important. 

 2-Press on the bees only when they are close to the flower. 

 3-The sun can wait, concentrate on the rest.

IMPORTANT!!! When starting the executable a cinematic with the tutorial appears, watch it to know better how to play.
